call_recording_consent.description: Indicates whether consent for call recordings is given or not

mms.description: Indicates if MMS capability is enabled

sms.description: Indicates if SMS capability is enabled

voice.description: Indicates if voice calling capability is enabled

categorised_greetings.description: Categorized greetings for the phone number

categorised_greetings_with_sub_settings.description: Categorized greetings with sub-settings for the phone number

country_code.description: Country code of the phone number

created_at.description: Date and time when the phone number was created

default_greeting_ids.description: IDs of default greetings for the phone number

default_group_id.description: ID of the default group assigned to the phone number

external.description: Indicates if the phone number is external

greeting_ids.description: IDs of greetings associated with the phone number

group_ids.description: IDs of groups associated with the phone number

id.description: Unique identifier of the phone number

ivr_id.description: IVR (Interactive Voice Response) ID associated with the phone number

line_type.description: Type of telephone line (e.g., landline, mobile)

outbound_enabled.description: Indicates if outbound calling is enabled

priority.description: Priority level of the phone number

schedule_id.description: ID of the schedule associated with the phone number

sms_group_id.description: ID of the group for SMS

token.description: Token associated with the phone number

toll_free.description: Indicates if the phone number is a toll-free number

transcription.description: Indicates if call transcription is enabled

voice_enabled.description: Indicates if voice calling is enabled
